Name: Flingleberries!
About the game: Life's about having fun! Stop taking it so seriously! FLINGLEBERRIES is a party-style, multiplayer “splat-former” where players bump, kick, and fling themselves to victory across a variety of maps and game modes! Sit back, relax, and enjoy some good, (un)clean, fun! You Deserve It.
